title: Sora 2 vs Google Veo 2: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Sora 2 vs Google Veo 2. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Sora 2 and Google Veo 2? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Sora 2 vs Google Veo 2
paragraphs: Sora 2 (generative ai) is Sora 2 is OpenAI's latest text-to-video generation model that creates high-quality, realistic videos up to 20 seconds long from text prompts or images. Released in September 2025, it features synchronized dialogue, ambient sound effects, and background music generated natively alongside video. Its key differentiator is the ability to generate cinematic, physically accurate videos with native audio in multiple styles including realistic, anime, and stylized formats.. It's known for video-generation, text-to-video, ai-video.

Google Veo 2 (video generation) is Google Veo 2 is a state-of-the-art generative AI model designed to create high-quality, realistic videos from text, image, or video prompts. It excels at producing 1080p resolution videos with fine-grained control over cinematic styles, advanced physics simulation, and temporal consistency for coherent motion. Primarily targeting professional creators and filmmakers, it distinguishes itself through deep integration with Google's ecosystem and research in scalable video generation.. Users choose it for video-generation, generative-ai, google-deepmind.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Sora 2: Text-to-video generation up to 20 seconds, Image-to-video with motion control, Native audio generation (dialogue, sound effects, music)

Google Veo 2: Generates 1080p resolution videos up to 60 seconds long from text prompts, Accepts image or video prompts for style and composition control, Advanced physics simulation for realistic motion and object interaction

verdict: Both Sora 2 and Google Veo 2 are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Sora 2 for video-generation, Google Veo 2 for video-generation.
